error_patterns.pattern: state space too large|out of memory|memory limit exceeded
error_patterns.description: DIVINE exhausted memory due to state space explosion in explicit-state model checking
common_causes: Too many threads or interleaving combinations
solutions: Use partial order reduction (--por) to reduce interleavings
Apply abstraction techniques to reduce state space
Add assume statements to constrain input domains
Use symmetry reduction for symmetric systems

error_patterns.description: DIVINE found an execution path that violates an assertion
solutions: Use --draw to visualize the error path
Review the interleaving in the counterexample

error_patterns.pattern: deadlock detected|cycle in wait-for graph|all threads blocked
error_patterns.description: DIVINE detected a deadlock where all threads are waiting
common_causes: Incorrect lock ordering causing circular wait
Thread join without corresponding thread creation
solutions: Examine the wait-for graph in the counterexample
Use consistent lock ordering across all code paths
Verify all locks are released in error handling

examples.error: deadlock detected: threads {1,2,3} in circular wait
examples.fix: Implement resource ordering or use trylock with backoff

error_patterns.pattern: LTL property violated|accepting cycle found|lasso-shaped counterexample
error_patterns.description: DIVINE found an execution violating an LTL property
common_causes: Liveness property violation (something eventually doesn't happen)
Safety property violation in infinite execution
solutions: Check if the LTL formula correctly captures intent

examples.error: LTL property 'G F grant' violated: accepting cycle found

error_patterns.description: DIVINE failed to parse or compile the input program
common_causes: C/C++ syntax error in source code
solutions: Compile with clang first to check for errors
Use divine cc to see compilation details

error_patterns.pattern: timeout|time limit exceeded|verification did not finish
error_patterns.description: DIVINE did not complete verification within the time limit
common_causes: State space too large for exhaustive exploration
solutions: Use bounded verification with depth limits
Simplify the model or add constraints

error_patterns.pattern: memory error|invalid memory access|use after free|double free

common_causes: Use after free in concurrent code
solutions: Examine the counterexample for the error path

error_patterns.description: DIVINE detected a data race between concurrent threads
solutions: Use memory barriers for lock-free code

examples.error: data race on variable 'counter' at line 23 and 45
examples.fix: Use atomic_int or protect with mutex
